Paul Dechant  Wednesday February  

Dear PleasaNDville

I read your latest comic in which you called out both The Tuesday Variety Show and The Mating Ritual PERIOD

Thats pretty bold talk PERIOD

You better step up your game PERIOD

Best regards

Paul Dechant

senior

Dillon Hall

Feb PERIOD 



Share This Story

I am writing this with  minutes to go in the third quarter but.. PERIOD
